[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: There is no universal definition for what constitutes an antique object. Certain tax agencies define items over 100 years old as antiques.

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: The most sensible thing to do when traveling in first class or business class is to take a nice nap (or, even better, let them do the work for you where you work).
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Ligurian]: À tutti i mòddi, tutti i belgi e i svisseri de lengua françeise an impreiso o françeise standard a-a scheua, e no avian di problemi à capîve ascì ben che deuviæ o scistema de numeraçion franseise standard.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Ligurian]: Into corso di secoli e gente gh’an edificou con cua de fasce in sciô paisaggio aspio e rapido, fin a-e scuggee che s’avansan in sciô mâ.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Ligurian]: 800 miggia do Trans-Alaska Pipeline System ean stæte serræ, apreuvo à unna perdia de miggiæa de barrî de petròlio grezzo, à sudde de Fairbanks, inte l'Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Ligurian]: De zöne che in giornâ forman parte do Belgio in tempo favan parte do Lussemburgo, ma son diventæ belghe apreuvo a-a rivoluçion belga di anni ’30 de l’Euttoçento.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Ligurian]: Fin da-o seu comenso, The Onion a l'é vegnua à ëse un vertadeo impëio da parodia do giornaliximo, con unn'ediçion à stampa, un scito web ch'o l'à attiou 5.000.000 vixitatoî sôo che into meise d'ötovie, personali ads, un network de notiçie à 24 oe, podcasts, e un atlante do mondo, stæto allansou che no l'é guæi, stæto ciammou Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
